translations.team.create.name.long: <red>The name of your team must contain less than 16 characters</red>
translations.team.create.name.short: <red>The name of your team must contain more than 2 characters</red>
translations.team.create.name.invalid: <red>The name of your team contains invalid characters</red>

translations.team.invite.already: <red>You have already invited %s to your team.</red>
translations.team.invite.self: <red>You can't invite yourself to your own team.</red>

translations.whitelist.remove: <green>%s has been removed from the whitelist</green>
translations.user.data.load.error: <red>There was an error loading your data. Please notify staff.</red>
